{
    "common": {
        "value": {
            "follow": {
                "value": false,
                "type": "removed"
            },
            "setting1": {
                "value": "Value 1",
                "type": "unchanged"
            },
            "setting2": {
                "value": 200,
                "type": "added"
            },
            "setting3": {
                "value": true,
                "old_value": null,
                "type": "updated"
            },
            "setting4": {
                "value": "blah blah",
                "type": "removed"
            },
            "setting5": {
                "value": {
                    "key5": {
                        "value": "value5",
                        "type": "unchanged"
                    }
                },
                "type": "removed"
            },
            "setting6": {
                "value": {
                    "doge": {
                        "value": {
                            "wow": {
                                "value": "",
                                "old_value": "so much",
                                "type": "updated"
                            }
                        },
                        "type": "nested"
                    },
                    "key": {
                        "value": "value",
                        "type": "unchanged"
                    },
                    "ops": {
                        "value": "vops",
                        "type": "removed"
                    }
                },
                "type": "nested"
            }
        },
        "type": "nested"
    },
    "group1": {
        "value": {
            "baz": {
                "value": "bas",
                "old_value": "bars",
                "type": "updated"
            },
            "foo": {
                "value": "bar",
                "type": "unchanged"
            },
            "nest": {
                "value": "{'key': 'value'}",
                "old_value": "str",
                "type": "updated"
            }
        },
        "type": "nested"
    },
    "group2": {
        "value": {
            "abc": {
                "value": 12345,
                "type": "unchanged"
            },
            "deep": {
                "value": {
                    "id": {
                        "value": 45,
                        "type": "unchanged"
                    }
                },
                "type": "unchanged"
            }
        },
        "type": "added"
    },
    "group3": {
        "value": {
            "deep": {
                "value": {
                    "id": {
                        "value": {
                            "number": {
                                "value": 45,
                                "type": "unchanged"
                            }
                        },
                        "type": "unchanged"
                    }
                },
                "type": "unchanged"
            },
            "fee": {
                "value": 100500,
                "type": "unchanged"
            }
        },
        "type": "removed"
    }
}
